channel.title: RuneSource Bug Fix?
channel.description:
Hey MoPaRScape!
I just joined, although I've been browsing around here for years, anyway, let me cut to the chase. I am coding a RuneSource server, and whenever I equip any item, instead of Hack, Slash, Block options etc; it shows a green shirt, and some green pants, and some colours at the bottom, it looks way too oversized. I was wondering if there was any way to fix this bug? Perhaps someone can direct me to a snippet thread to fix this error. Or tell me how to fix it straightforward.
Thank you
TiVo

item.title: RuneSource Bug Fix?
item.dc:creator: @TiVo TiVo
item.description:
@TiVo wrote:

It’s a Azure (runesource) thanks for the help.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Bug Fix?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Well, it depends on your source. I don’t know, but it’s usually something like

client.setSidebarInterface(0, weaponInterfaceId);// Where 0 is the index on the sidebar

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Bug Fix?
item.dc:creator: @TiVo TiVo
item.description:
@TiVo wrote:

How would I declare the statement?

Thanks.

EDIT: I know I’m a noob asking a lot of questions, but I’m trying to learn and be more knowledgeable of the language. Everyone’s gotta start somewhere.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Bug Fix?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“TiVo, post:3, topic:425878”]Any idea on how to fix this issue?

Bump.[/quote]

Well first you’re going to have to identify which interfaces should be shown depending on the weapons (daggers are different from maces, maces are different from maces with specials, etc).

After you have all of them down, you just have to add a call to the setSidebarInterface() button every time the player equips, or removes a weapon.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneSource Bug Fix?
item.dc:creator: @TiVo TiVo
item.description:

Any idea on how to fix this issue?

item.title: RuneSource Bug Fix?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“TiVo, post:1, topic:425878”]Hey MoPaRScape!

I just joined, although I’ve been browsing around here for years, anyway, let me cut to the chase. I am coding a RuneSource server, and whenever I equip any item, instead of Hack, Slash, Block options etc; it shows a green shirt, and some green pants, and some colours at the bottom, it looks way too oversized. I was wondering if there was any way to fix this bug? Perhaps someone can direct me to a snippet thread to fix this error. Or tell me how to fix it straightforward.

Thank you

TiVo[/quote]

Sounds like it’s setting the interface of the attack tab to 0 instead of the appropriate weapon option tab.

Read full topic
